comments:
I downloaded eclipse 3.0 candidate and then installed CDT v200406250301 using
update manager. The update was fine but I try to open a CDT perspective I get
errors. 
One error that I've noticed it the one attached below because your plugin does
not have the correct constructor. There is two ways to fix that, one is to
reintroduce the constructor, the other is to add <?eclipse version="3.0"?> in
your plugin.xml.

The update site (unfortunately) does not work with our nightly builds.  
Please reopen the defect if you find the same behaviour when you install the 
zip file yourself.  Thanks.
